meanings.definition: Causing feelings of embarrassment or awkwardness
meanings.sent1: The movie had many cringeworthy moments that made me feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her cringeworthy jokes always made everyone squirm in their seats.
meanings.sent3: His cringeworthy dance moves were so awkward that they made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The cringeworthy silence in the room was deafening.
meanings.sent5: The cringeworthy situation was etched in my memory forever.

meanings.sent1: The cringeworthy performance left the audience speechless.
meanings.sent2: The cringeworthy behavior of the politician was widely criticized.
meanings.sent3: The cringeworthy fashion choices at the event were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The cringeworthy decision had long-lasting consequences.
meanings.sent5: The cringeworthy mistake was impossible to forget.
